thread.title: Employers woo Millennials with help paying off student loans

author: Kathleen Pender
title: Employers woo Millennials with help paying off student loans
text:
Photo: Sean Proctor Tim DeMello is the founder and CEO of Gradifi, a platform that lets companies pay off some of their employees' student loans. Sean Proctor / Special to the Chronicle Tim DeMello is the founder and CEO of Gradifi, a platform that lets...
Will student loan repayment become the next big perk in recruiting wars? Tim DeMello is the founder and CEO of Gradifi, a platform that lets companies pay off some of their employees' student loans. Sean Proctor / Special to the Chronicle Tim DeMello is the founder and CEO of Gradifi, a platform that lets...
